derivation: from G2596 (καταβραβεύω) and G1018 (καταβραβεύω) (in its original sense);
strongs_def: to award the price against, i.e. (figuratively) to defraud (of salvation)
outline:
1. to decide as umpire against someone
  2. to defraud or beguile of the prize of victory
  3. metaph. to deprive of salvation
